long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ASIN Super Extractor is a free tool made to get Amazon Standard Identification Number information from product page you visit on Amazon. It works for Amazon(dot)com and other Amazon related websites. Just visit the page with the products and click on the extension icon to get all the ASINs available from that page. From There you can then copy all ASIN to your clipboard with just one click.
